story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful island of Sri Lanka, there lived a little elephant named Kiri. Kiri was a playful and curious elephant who loved to explore the lush forests and meet new friends.

One sunny day, Kiri decided to take a walk through the forest to see what adventures awaited him. As he walked along the winding paths, he came across a family of monkeys swinging from tree to tree. The monkeys welcomed Kiri with open arms and taught him how to swing from branch to branch.

With the monkeys, Kiri discovered a hidden waterfall deep in the heart of the forest. The waterfall was breathtaking, with crystal-clear water cascading down into a sparkling pool below. Kiri and his new friends splashed and played in the cool water, laughing and having the time of their lives.

As the sun began to set, Kiri knew it was time to head back home. He said goodbye to his monkey friends and walked back through the forest, the stars twinkling above him in the night sky. When he reached his cozy little burrow, Kiri curled up in his soft bed of leaves and closed his eyes, feeling happy and content.

As Kiri drifted off to sleep, he whispered to the night sky, "Thank you for the wonderful adventures today. I am grateful for my friends and the beauty of the forest." And with that, Kiri fell into a peaceful slumber, dreaming of the magical wonders of the forest.

And so, dear child, always remember the adventures of Kiri the elephant and the friends he made along the way. May your dreams be filled with joy and wonder, just like Kiri's adventure in the enchanted forest of Sri Lanka. Goodnight, sweet child, sleep tight and have magical dreams.
